message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think you'd find it valuable. I'm offering it to you for $200. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $200 represents the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $170 to make a deal.
I appreciate the discount, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $140.
